mapper.insert: insert into tbl_boardAdmin ( code , reply , answer , editor , attach , declar , notice , auth , title , writer , day , ip ) values ( BoardAdmin_seq.nextval, #{reply} , #{answer} , #{editor} , #{attach} , #{declar} , #{notice} , #{auth} , #{title} , #{writer} , sysdate , #{ip} )
mapper.update: update tbl_boardAdmin set reply=#{reply}, answer=#{answer}, editor=#{editor}, attach=#{attach}, declar=#{declar}, notice=#{notice}, auth=#{auth}, title=#{title} , updater=#{updater}, updatedate=sysdate, ip=#{ip} where code=#{code}
